# Site entry for LLMs (html-preview)
#
# Notes:
# - This site is optimized for clients that can only read the first ~10k tokens per request.
# - Prefer small indexes and then jump directly to core text.

Start here (recommended):
- /html-preview/llms.txt

Choose your task (fast):
- Statutes: /html-preview/ai-law-db/quickstart.txt
- Circulars: /html-preview/ai-tsutatsu-db/llms.txt
- Cases/rulings: /html-preview/ai-hanketsu-db/quickstart.txt
- Papers/guidelines: /html-preview/ai-paper-db/llms.txt
- Tax treaties: /html-preview/ai-treaty-db/jp-tax-treaties/quickstart.txt
- Tax KB: /html-preview/tax-kb/quickstart.txt

Cheat sheets (short):
- URL patterns: /html-preview/_fastpaths.txt
- Small index files: /html-preview/_indices.txt

Advanced (statute title resolution):
- /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta_corp/index.json
- /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta/index.json
